餙餙餙

餙字的基本解释

餙
shì
古同“饰”。

餙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》賞職切，入職，書。］
“饰1”的繁体字。“飭2”的被通假字。亦作“餙1”。亦作“餝1”。
(1)拭。
(2)修饰；装饰。
(3)给衣领衣袖滚边。
(4)指袖口。
(5)服饰。
(6)饰品；首饰。
(7)指宝物。
(8)《庄子·马蹄》：“前有橛飾之患。”成玄英疏：“橛，銜也。謂以寶物飾於鑣也。”陆德明释文：“司馬云：'排銜也。'謂加飾於馬鑣也。”遂借指马口中的衔。
(9)粉饰；伪装。
(10)犹致力。
(11)表现，显示。
(12)表彰；奖饰。
(13)被覆。
(14)扮演。
[②]［chì］
［《集韻》蓄力切，入職，徹。］
“饰2”的繁体字。通“飭1”。亦作“餙2”。
(1)整治；整顿。
(2)端正；谨慎。
(3)戒备。

餙字的康熙字典解释
餙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
餙字的起名意思

暂无。

餙
Basic explanation of words
餙
shì
Gu Tong "decorated".
餙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" Appreciation, entry, book. ]
Traditional characters for "饰1". "饬2" was passed false characters. Also known as "餙1". Also known as "餝1".
(1) Wipe.
(2) Modification; decoration.
(3) Piping the collar and sleeves.
(4) Refers to the cuffs.
(5) Clothing.
(6) Jewelry; jewelry.
(7) Refers to treasures.
(8) "Zhuangzi · Horseshoe": "There is a problem with prong decoration before." Cheng Xuanying said: "Prong, title also. It is said that treasures are decorated in 镳镳." Lu Deming explained: "Sima Yun:'The row of titles is also.' It is said to be decorated with horse 镳." Then borrowed the title in the horse's mouth.
(9) Whitewash; camouflage.
(10) Still committed.
(11) Performance, display.
(12) Commendation; award decoration.
(13) Covered.
(14) Play.
[②]［chì］
["Jiyun" is full of strength, entry, thoroughness. ]
Traditional characters for "饰2". Same as "饬1". Also known as "餙2".
(1) Rectification; rectification.
(2) Correct; be cautious.
(3) Beware.
餙
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
餙
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
餙
Name meaning
Nothing.
shì, xī
to adorn; ornaments; to deceive
